pullrequest.title: Adjusted vision perception to match SimSpark convention.

content.raw: This fix seems to fix the problem I was having of not being able to localize.  Our agent can now chase (slowly) after the ball!  To get things to work I have to prevent our agent from panning its head from side to side however...maybe there's a sign flip in the azimuth value?  Maybe the agent isn't receiving the same information about its head's joint angle as it does in simspark?
